name: Insult-a-tron9000
0:
”Alexa, open Insultatron nine thousand”
”Alexa, tell insult a tron nine thousand to insult Steve”
”Insult Greg!”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: insult a tron nine thousand
des:
Is someone talking smack?!! Get them with the perfect comeback with the Insult-a-tron 9000 skill for Amazon Alexa. 

Once you've made the wise decision to enable the skill, you'll be on your way to insulting every single one of your enemies! 

Just open the skill by saying, "Alexa, open insult-a-tron 9000". Then say, "Insult {Name}", saying the name of who you want to target! 

Users will also have the option to upgrade to a Premium Insults packet, which will enable access to high quality insults and comebacks from one of our great voice actors. 

Disclaimer: The Insult-a-tron 9000 contains material that may only be suited for a mature audience.
